name: gh.js
description: Tiny GitHub API wrapper for server and client

scripts.update-min: cp dist/gh.min.js example/gh.min.js && git add example && git commit -m 'Updated gh.min.js in the example dir' .
scripts.deploy: cp -r example ../_tmp && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r ../_tmp/* . && git add . -A && git commit -m 'Rebuild.' && rm -rf ../_tmp ../_tmp.js

author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com>
